#### About

This web application provides an interactive interface to explore the predicted burden of asthma in the United States, both in terms of the quality of life reduction in patients, and the associated medical costs.
Please refer to the manuscript for more details on the structure of the model and the validation process.

#### Citation

Please cite this paper when using the results of this web application:

```Yaghoubi et al. The projected economic and health burden of uncontrolled asthma in the United States```

The biorxiv paper can be found at https://www.biorxiv.org/content/biorxiv/early/2019/01/12/516740.full.pdf.

#### Bug Report
